about_the_game:
Welcome to CAD Smart Modeling, your complete solution for precise 3D modeling and innovative design! Whether you are an architect, engineer or DIY enthusiast, our app offers powerful features to help you turn your creative ideas into reality.

Characteristics:

• 3D modeling made easy: Use our intuitive tools to create stunning digital models. Whether you are a professional or a beginner, you will achieve amazing results.

• Precise Design: Access advanced design tools to create detailed models for architecture, product development, and more.

• Versatile and innovative: Discover the world of 3D modeling, digital design and product development in a single application.

• Home Improvement and DIY Projects: CAD Smart Modeling is the perfect companion for DIY enthusiasts. Plan, design and build effortlessly with our tools.

• Export and Share: Save your models in various formats and share them with others. Show the world what you've created or collaborate seamlessly with colleagues.

• Creativity without limits: Unleash your imagination and create impressive models for architecture, product design, 3D printing and more. CAD Smart Modeling gives you the freedom to make your visions become reality.

• Tools for all applications: Whether technical drawing, geometric modeling, surface modeling or prototype construction – our app offers the tools for every requirement.

• Creative 3D Modeling: Create unique and impressive 3D models or 3D texts for your social media platforms and impress your followers.

• Import CAD models: Use the import function and easily integrate your own 3D models or select from a variety of 3D models on the Internet to quickly and easily load them into CAD Smart Modeling.

Whether you're a hobbyist, student or professional designer - CAD Smart Modeling is the perfect app to turn your creative ideas into reality.

Download CAD Smart Modeling now and discover the endless possibilities of 3D modeling and design!
detailed_description:
Welcome to CAD Smart Modeling, your complete solution for precise 3D modeling and innovative design! Whether you are an architect, engineer or DIY enthusiast, our app offers powerful features to help you turn your creative ideas into reality.

Characteristics:

• 3D modeling made easy: Use our intuitive tools to create stunning digital models. Whether you are a professional or a beginner, you will achieve amazing results.

• Precise Design: Access advanced design tools to create detailed models for architecture, product development, and more.

• Versatile and innovative: Discover the world of 3D modeling, digital design and product development in a single application.

• Home Improvement and DIY Projects: CAD Smart Modeling is the perfect companion for DIY enthusiasts. Plan, design and build effortlessly with our tools.

• Export and Share: Save your models in various formats and share them with others. Show the world what you've created or collaborate seamlessly with colleagues.

• Creativity without limits: Unleash your imagination and create impressive models for architecture, product design, 3D printing and more. CAD Smart Modeling gives you the freedom to make your visions become reality.

• Tools for all applications: Whether technical drawing, geometric modeling, surface modeling or prototype construction – our app offers the tools for every requirement.

• Creative 3D Modeling: Create unique and impressive 3D models or 3D texts for your social media platforms and impress your followers.

• Import CAD models: Use the import function and easily integrate your own 3D models or select from a variety of 3D models on the Internet to quickly and easily load them into CAD Smart Modeling.

Whether you're a hobbyist, student or professional designer - CAD Smart Modeling is the perfect app to turn your creative ideas into reality.

Download CAD Smart Modeling now and discover the endless possibilities of 3D modeling and design!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X Leopard
  • Processor: Intel 5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

name: CAD Smart Modeling

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ / AMD Ryzen™
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000 / GeForce GTX 480 / Radeon HD 5450
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

short_description: CAD Smart Modeling is one of the best CAD tools for craftsmen, architects, engineers or hobbyists. Draw your project in 3D today.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Simplified Chinese, Danish, Finnish, Greek, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Swedish, Thai, Czech, Turkish, Ukrainian, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Albanian, Basque, Belarusian, Bangla, Bosnian, Estonian, Georgian, Hindi, Irish, Icelandic, Kannada, Croatian, Malay, Marathi, Mongolian, Persian, Serbian, Sindhi, Slovak, Slovenian, Tamil, Turkmen, Urdu, Uzbek, Yoruba, Zulu
